markdown: ###### Minor positive reputation with [Neketaka](/neketaka/);[Bronlar's Phalanx](/bronlarsPhalanx/) | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = Bounty - Ikorno | conc = | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_Rathun | guid = 334b5ad4-1774-4588-85cc-9913a28b7d44 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [bounty](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Urnox Breinth, a Rathun warlord, has been launching attacks on Neketaka's shipping lanes. He and his crew were last seen taking shelter on an island in the southern midpoint of Magran's Teeth. Killing him would earn a significant bounty. ## Walkthrough * Obtain the quest by speaking to [Okauro](/okauro/) at [The Sacred Stair](/theSacredStair/). * Located on an island at [Magran's Teeth](/magransTeeth/), at 1째 12' S, 51째 54' E. He's accompanied by a number of other rathun (varies depending on difficulty). Drops [Bronlar's Phalanx](/bronlarsPhalanx/). ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_Rathun.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Urnox the Rathun''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Urnox Breinth, a Rathun warlord, has been launching attacks on Neketaka's shipping lanes. He and his crew were last seen taking shelter on an island in the southern midpoint of Magran's Teeth. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill Urnox.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | The warlord can be found in an island in the middle of Magran's Teeth. Killing him would earn a significant bounty. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Okauro.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Urnox is dead. Okauro in the Sacred Stair district of Neketaka will pay a handsome bounty for evidence of the kill. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="1" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 30001 | |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I killed Urnox and collected the reward money from Okauro. |}
